title: Heated Pool -Virtual Tour -1 Month Free -Efficiency in Westwood
posting_body: ['1 Month Free on a 12 Month Lease', 'Virtual Tour Unit# 416 <URL>', 'Contact info', '| eight70 |', 'show contact info', 'eight70', '870 Hilgard Avenue Westwood, CA 90024', 'Live Video Calls & In-Person Tours Available', 'DESCRIPTION', "With a peaceful setting created by ivy-draped walls, interaction-focused lounge areas and a resort-style pool, you'll be surprised to find edgy features hidden throughout the property.", 'Custom graffiti art walls, cabana lounges and sultry color palettes keep the vibe energetic.', 'eight70 proudly mirrors the multidimensional layers of Westwood Village.', 'Located just seconds from the Botanical Gardens and UCLA Campus, as well as countless restaurants and shops, eight70 offers an outstanding Walk Score of 82.', 'The community is surrounding by a bustling neighborhood, yet set in such a way that a retreat from the busy world is always available.', 'Your new life awaits you, at eight70.', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '- Plank Flooring Throughout', '- Gourmet Appliance Package', '- Quartz Countertops & Backsplashes', '- Floor to Ceiling Tile Showers', '- Air Conditioning', '- Penthouse Options', '- Private Balconies and Patios', '- Double Pane Windows', '- Spacious Walk In Closet(s)', 'In-Unit Features & Amenities Vary', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', '- Multiple Elevators', '- Custom Graffiti Art Wall', '- Laundry Facilities & Dry Cleaning', '- Lush Landscaping', '- Conference & Study Room', '- Heated Resort-Style Pool', '- Brand New Fitness Center', '- Outdoor Cabana Lounges', 'PET-FRIENDLY', 'Pets Welcomed, Additional Fees May Apply.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Call For Lease Terms', 'ADDITIONAL LINKS', '<URL>/', 'Virtual Tours: <URL>', 'Contact Info:', 'eight70', 'show contact info', 'Square footage is approximate.', 'Price and availability may change.', 'Key Terms: UCLA, West Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Sunset Strip, Brentwood, Bel Air, Century City, Holmby Hills, Cheviot Hills']
